job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Senior Data Engineer</strong></p><p><strong>McLean VA</strong></p><p><strong>12 Months CTH</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Must Have Skills:</strong></p><p>AWS Services - Lambda</p><p>Python</p><p>Apache Spark/ PySpark</p><p>at least some Java exp. &amp; Rest API is must</p><p>DevOps/ CI/CD/ Jenkins</p><p><br></p><p><strong>JOB DESCRIPTION&nbsp;</strong></p><p>Senior Data Engineer - Jigsaw current and future roadmap primarily building automation capabilities would involve </p><p>Develop data pipelines using Apache Spark , PySpark , python , spark SQL , REST API , Postgres DB , Lambda Serverless solutions in AWS ,</p><p>hands on AWS experience , DevOps experience (YBYO).<strong>&nbsp;</strong></p>
